```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(Lahman)
theme_set(theme_light())
```

```{r}
pitchers <- Pitching %>%
  group_by(playerID) %>%
  summarize(gamesPitched = sum(G)) %>%
  filter(gamesPitched > 3)
career <- Batting %>%
  filter(AB > 0) %>%
  anti_join(pitchers, by = "playerID") %>%
  group_by(playerID) %>%
  summarize(H = sum(H), AB = sum(AB)) %>%
  mutate(average = H / AB)
# add player names
career <- Master %>%
  tbl_df() %>%
  dplyr::select(playerID, nameFirst, nameLast) %>%
  unite(name, nameFirst, nameLast, sep = " ") %>%
  inner_join(career, by = "playerID")

# values estimated by maximum likelihood in Chapter 3
alpha0 <- 101.4
beta0 <- 287.3
prior_mu <- alpha0 / (alpha0 + beta0)
# for each player, update the beta prior based on the evidence
# to get posterior parameters alpha1 and beta1
career_eb <- career %>%
  mutate(eb_estimate = (H + alpha0) / (AB + alpha0 + beta0))%>%
  mutate(alpha1 = H + alpha0,beta1 = AB - H + beta0) %>%
  arrange(desc(eb_estimate))
```

```{r}
library(gamlss)
fit <- gamlss(data = career_eb,
              family = BB(mu.link = "identity"),
              cbind(H, AB - H) ~ log(AB)
              )
```
```{r}
fitted_mu <- fitted(fit, parameter = "mu")
fitted_sigma <- fitted(fit, parameter = "sigma")
career_eb <- career_eb %>% 
  mutate(alpha_prior = fitted_mu / fitted_sigma,
         beta_prior = (1-fitted_mu) / fitted_sigma,
         alpha_post = alpha_prior + H,
         beta_post = beta_prior - H + AB,
         bb_estimate_post = alpha_post / (beta_post + alpha_post)
         )
```
```{r}
career_eb %>% 
  pivot_longer(c(average, eb_estimate,bb_estimate_post), names_to = "type", values_to = "estimate") %>% 
  ggplot(aes(log(AB), estimate))+
  geom_point()+
  facet_wrap(~type)+
  geom_smooth(method = "lm")+
  NULL
  
```
